title: UK foreign minister Cameron to meet Blinken in Davos
paragraph:
Â© Reuters. FILE PHOTO: British Foreign Secretary David Cameron leaves following a Cabinet meeting at 10 Downing Street in London, Britain, January 9, 2024. REUTERS/Toby Melville/File Photo
LONDON (Reuters) - Britain's foreign minister David Cameron will meet U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken and other leaders at the Word Economic Forum in Davos, the British government said on Wednesday. Cameron plans to reiterate Britain's support for Ukraine and call for security and stability in the Middle East, the government said in a statement.
